documentation.text:
@title Lending Pool Token Support
 @dev used to add new supported ERC20 or ERC721 tokens to the lending pool, will give access to the chainlink USD price feeds.

@dev Gets the USD price of a supported token using Chainlink Oracle.
 @param token The address of the token.

@dev Checks if a token is supported.
 @param token The address of the token.

devdoc.details: used to add new supported ERC20 or ERC721 tokens to the lending pool, will give access to the chainlink USD price feeds.

getTokenPrice(address).details: Gets the USD price of a supported token using Chainlink Oracle.

devdoc.title: Lending Pool Token Support
